overview: How far would you go to find the love of your dreams? For Kevin Williams and stowaway, Diana Vanderbilt, it would be to the future where they risk everything to ensure their love will last. Weaving science and romance together the couple must find a way back home while stranded in a strangely familiar future . Packed with classic sci-fi and modern science, Counter-Clockwise asks how far would you go for love.
title: Counter-Clockwise
